name: Asian Mass Migration - California Gold Rush
description: Due to the abundance of gold discovered in California. Chinese miners begin to arrive to California. This is the first mass migration of Asians to the United States.

name: Foreigner Miner's Tax
description: California begins to impose the miner's tax on Chinese miners. This made it so that Chinese miners paid tax more than once.

name: Chinese Exclusion Act
description: This law put a 10-year ban on Chinese laborers. Due to this chinese laborers could no longer immigrate to the United States.
